"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>74353</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>dedf89cd-4f70-4ab5-8826-a2d4b40e9d4a#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Középponti szögek és körív, egyenes arány- ábra</string>
            <string language="en">Midst angles and arc, direct proportion - illustration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mittewinkel und Bogen, direkter Anteil - 
Abbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angles de milieu et arc, proportion directe - 
illustration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos do meio e arco, proporção direta - 
ilustração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angoli di midst ed arco, proporzione diretta - 
illustrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνίες μέσης και τόξο, άμεση αναλογία - απεικόνιση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ángulos y arco, proporción directa - 
ilustración del medio</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A középponti szög és a hozzá kapcsolódó körív egyenes arányát szemléltető ábra.</string>
            <string language="en">Illustration demonstrating direct proportion of midst angle and the connecting arc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">9. osztály,  kép,  tétel,  </string>
            <string language="en">9. class,   picture, thesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung, die direkten Anteil Mittewinkel und 
dem anschließenden Bogen zeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Illustration démontrant la proportion directe de
l'angle de milieu et de l'arc se reliant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ilustração que demonstra a proporção direta 
do ângulo do meio e do arco conectando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazione che dimostra proporzione diretta 
dell'angolo di midst e dell'arco di collegamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση που καταδεικνύει το άμεσο ποσοστό της 
γωνίας μέσης και του συνδέοντας τόξου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ilustración que demuestra la proporción directa 
del ángulo del medio y del arco que conecta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">9. Kategorie, Abbildung, These</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">9. classe, image, thèse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">9. classe, retrato, thesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">9. codice categoria, immagine, tesi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">9. κλάση, εικόνα, διατριβή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">9. clase, cuadro, tesis</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>790</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
